reporting-org.narrative: Ministry for Foreign Affairs of Finland

title.narrative: Promotion of the work concerning democracy good governance and stability of the eastern partnership of the EU

description.narrative: The focus of the Wider European initiative (WEI) 2014 - 2017 is the promotion of human rights and a democratic and responsible society. This objective is pursued a by supporting the thematic block of democracy good governance and stability of the EU?s East ern Partnership (EaP). The EaP countries are Armenia Azerbaijan Belarus Georgia Moldova and Ukraine. In this framework Finland will organize together with Estonia a seminar for the EaP countries and carry out a comparative study. The aim is to further the openness of the EaP countries? public administration by improving the level of personal data protection and developing e-governance. Participation of external experts to other similar EaP seminars and trainings will also be supported.
